description: This Dashboard is used to visualise the metrics from the security reports of the Trivy Operator

panels.description: Total number of security issues by type.
panels.title: Security Overview

panels.description: Note that this may include duplicates for images running in multiple namespaces and workloads.
panels.title: Severity Breakdown of all Image Exposed Secrets

targets.expr: sum(max(trivy_image_exposedsecrets{cluster=~"$cluster", severity=~"$severity", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (image_repository, image_tag, severity)) by (severity)
sum(max(trivy_image_exposedsecrets{cluster=~"$cluster", severity=~"$severity", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (image_repository, image_tag, severity, namespace)) by (namespace)
sum(max(trivy_image_exposedsecrets{cluster=~"$cluster", severity=~"$severity", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (image_repository, image_tag, severity)) by (image_repository, image_tag)

panels.title: Severity Breakdown of all Image Vulnerabilities

targets.expr: sum(max(trivy_image_vulnerabilities{cluster=~"$cluster", severity=~"$severity", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (image_repository, image_tag, severity)) by (severity)
sum(max(trivy_image_vulnerabilities{cluster=~"$cluster", severity=~"$severity", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (image_repository, image_tag, severity, namespace)) by (namespace)
sum(max(trivy_image_vulnerabilities{cluster=~"$cluster", severity=~"$severity", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (image_repository, image_tag, severity)) by (image_repository, image_tag)

panels.title: Severity Breakdown of all Resource Misconfigurations

title: Trivy Operator Dashboard
